items.sentence: How did you know that Tom was planning on doing that?
Tom is very sleepy and can hardly keep his eyes open.
Tom always wears a helmet when riding his motorcycle.
Tom and I are the only ones who are going to do that.
Tom and I are the only ones who know how to fix this.
You\'re not thinking of taking Tom with you, are you?
Didn\'t you know that Tom had relatives in Australia?
Didn\'t you know that Tom was in Australia last week?
Tom couldn\'t help but notice how beautiful Mary was.
Tom is wearing a shirt that\'s way too large for him.
Tom wasn\'t telling the truth about where he\'d been.
Tom and Mary sat next to each other in the classroom.
Tom was killed by a poison dart fired from a blowgun.
Tom writes home to his parents at least once a month.
Tom won\'t have to go through what Mary went through.
Tom held up the bottle to see how much wine was left.
It probably wouldn\'t be easy to do that by yourself.
I stopped what I was doing and turned to look at Tom.
I sure wish I could speak French as well as Tom does.
It\'s a beautiful night for a swim, don\'t you think?
